Containers.Name: .NET Core
Containers.Description: It is very easy to get started with .NET Core on your platform of choice. For ASP.NET Core 1.0 + .NET Core RC instructions, please go to the Get ASP.NET Core 1.0 website. You just need a shell, a text editor and 10 minutes of your time. Ready? Set? Let's go!
